title: Cinematic Text Block Reveal Animation
description: This project is a modern, editorial-style landing page concept that features a sophisticated "Block Reveal" typography effect. As users navigate the site using Lenis smooth scrolling, text content is unveiled line-by-line via a dynamic sliding mask (colored block).

Static House

Menu

Framed in tungsten and shadows, every shot holds its own deliberate tension.

This is cinematography in its raw form with practical lamps, soft falloff, and the presence of grain that fills each corner of the frame. Every room functions as a set and every posture becomes a composition. Light moves across furniture and faces, shaping scenes with a natural sense of depth.

Still frames with bold contrast and lighting choices that embrace imperfection.

The camera settles into long takes and patient movement. Colors stay unrefined and shadows turn into texture. The image waits for action instead of chasing it. Every frame forms a clear visual language built through restraint.

Cinematography thrives in the details from the grain to the falloff to the glow.

title: Kinetic Scroll Typography & Responsive Velocity Marquee
description: This project creates a highly interactive hero section found in high-end creative portfolios. It features a "sticky" scroll experience where the viewport stays pinned while typography transforms word-by-word based on scroll progress. Additionally, an infinite marquee at the bottom reacts to the scroll velocity, accelerating when the user scrolls faster.

The neon lights of the bustling space station flicker as you make your way through the crowded marketplace. Cyborgs and androids jostle for position alongside human merchants, all selling their wares in a symphony of sound and color. You pause to admire the sleek lines of a hovering hoverbike, its thrusters humming with energy. This is a world of advanced technology and gritty streets, where anything is possible - for the right price.
The artificial intelligence known as Martie. oversees every aspect of life on the colony ship, from air quality to food production. But when a group of rogue hackers try to take control of the system, chaos erupts. You find yourself in the middle of a deadly game of cat and mouse, fighting for survival against a sentient enemy that knows your every move before you do.
The planet below is a desolate wasteland, the air thick with toxic fumes and the ground scarred by decades of war. You and your team of rebels must navigate this deadly landscape to reach the hidden underground bunker where the resistance is gathering. Along the way, you encounter all manner of cyber-enhanced enemies, from killer robots to genetically engineered beasts. But the fate of the galaxy is at stake, and failure is not an option.
The sleek lines of the starship gleam in the bright sun, its engines humming with power. You take your place at the controls, ready to embark on a journey to the furthest reaches of space. The ship's AI companion, a sentient being known only as S.E.N.T., provides vital information and guidance as you navigate through uncharted territory. But as you encounter alien species and strange new worlds, you begin to question whether the mission is worth the risks.
The towering skyscrapers of the metropolis stretch up into the clouds, a symbol of human progress and ambition. But the gleaming faade hides a darker truth - this is a world ruled by corporations, where the rich and powerful hold all the cards. As a member of the underground resistance, you must use your wits and your cyber-enhanced abilities to fight back against the oppressive regime. But with spies and informants around every corner, you can trust no one.
The cyberspace world known as The Grid is a dazzling display of light and sound, a virtual world where anything is possible. But when a group of rogue hackers begin to wreak havoc on the system, you are called upon to track them down and stop them. With your cybernetic enhancements and your skills as a hacker, you plunge into the depths of The Grid, dodging firewalls and traps as you hunt for the enemy. But as you get closer to the truth, you realize that the stakes are higher than you ever imagined.
